Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dr James Nichols
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv because I needed a 12 volt tv for my RV.  Although I would have loved a bigger size, the cost was too prohibitive.  However, when the tv arrived, it turned out to be the perfect size for the space I had to mount the tv.Several reviews I read commented about the sound being too low.  I have not noticed this problem and my hearing is not the best.  I can hear the tv volume just fine!  The picture quality is great and the tuner picks up a lot of digital channels.I highly recommend this tv model and may order another one for the rear bedroom in my rv.

ProductInfo.Features:
22 TV (21.5 Viewable) Slim LED Backlight and Built-In DVD Player.
1920 x 1080 Resolution with 16.7M Display Colors and ATSC/ NTSC.
Brightness: 250 cd/m2 Response Time: 5ms.
A/V Playback: PAL / SECAM / NTSC.
ProductInfo.Name: Skyworth - SLC2219A - 22 TV/DVD Combo with LED Backlighting and AC/DC Power
